location: Kansas City metro area (KCMO/KS); Overland Park, KS
summary: IT professional with extensive experience in system administration, virtualization (VMware ESXi, Microsoft Hyper-V), data-center migrations, cloud adoption (Azure, AWS), backup/DR, and network security. Proven ability to design, implement, and manage complex infrastructure, move production environments to the cloud with minimal downtime, and coordinate across vendors and ISPs. Skilled in SAN/storage ( EMC VNX/VNXe ), monitoring (SolarWinds), and security devices (Cisco ASA, WatchGuard, F5 BigIP).

experience.title: Systems Administrator
experience.company: Sprint ISP Management to the Vendor
experience.description: Performed system administration for clients in KCMO/KS; moved critical servers to data center without interruption; migrated production servers to Azure and AWS; conducted cost analyses for cloud transition; moved office, designed network infrastructure; setup wireless infrastructure; installed PBX Grandstream; migrated from analog to fiber with DID for PBX; restructured backup with Dell AppAssure (backup of 22 Windows VMs including 2 SQL and 2 Exchange); completed P2V using ESXi 5.5; converted 22 servers; configured Orion SolarWinds to monitor and report on network devices; coordinated cutover of 21 remote locations; technologies included SonicWall/Cisco ASA Firewall, Windows Server 2003-2012, ESXi 4.1-5.5; Exchange 2007/2013; IIS; Dell switches/servers; AppAssure; Azure/AWS; Pertino; EMC VNX 5300/VNXe 3200.

experience.title: Systems Engineer
experience.description: Relocated company production network from MainMark DataCenter to Layered Tech ATC after company sold; built new infrastructure using Cisco UCS B200 Blade Server and VMware ESXi 5.1 Enterprise; EMC VNX 5300 SAN/Fibre Channel; migrated SSL certificates from Brocade Load Balancers to F5 BigIP LTM; configured Orion SolarWinds monitoring; redesigned ESXi 5.1 installation to HA/DFS/vMotion with Fibre Channel to SAN.

experience.title: IT Director
experience.description: Performed hardware, software and network upgrades; installed Windows Server 2003 Enterprise and upgraded to 2008 R2; maintained system security for 32 servers and 90 end-users; implemented ESXi virtualization expanding from 4 to 32 servers; analyzed infrastructure to plan layout; technologies included Watchguard, Cisco switches, Dell/HP servers and switches, Windows Server 2003/2008, ESXi 3.5-5.1, Exchange 2003/2010 DAG, IIS, Trilead VMX, VEEAM, Unitrends.

experience.title: Kansas State Government contractor
experience.description: Provided IT support for state government contracts, including workstation/server deployment, network maintenance, security best practices and troubleshooting; experience with Windows NT/2000/2003 environments and related networking technologies.
